vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Εὔτυχος, -ου, ὁ
(εὖ, τυχή),
Butychus, a young man: Act.20:9.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.20.9
§ Eutychus, "fortunate"
Eutychus, (Proper name), Acts 20:9*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
猶推古 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "幸運"
被保羅救起, 恢復生命年輕人 (徒 20:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
犹推古 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "幸运"
被保罗救起, 恢复生命年轻人 (徒 20:9)
